text: ka#lpayati vaiShNaqvO vai dEqvata#yAq yUpaqH svayaiqvaina#M dEqvata#yA kalpayatiq dvAByA$M kalpayati dviqpAd yaja#mAnaqH prati#ShThityaiq yaM kAqmayE#taq tEja#sainaM dEqvatA#BirindriqyENaq vya#d^^rdhayEyaq-mitya#gniqShThAM tasyASri#-mAhavaqnIyA#diqtthaM ~MvEqtthaM ~MvA&ti# nAvayEqt tEja#saiqvaina#M dEqvatA#BirindriqyENaq vya#d^^rdhayatiq yaM kAqmayE#taq tEja#sainaM dEqvatA#BirindriqyENaq sama#d^^rdhayEyaqmitya#- [  ] 22
